H0.text: Tuesday marks the birthday of lat night tv host David Letterman. What broadcast channel hosts his show. NBC

H1.text: Tuesday marks the birthday of lat night tv host David Letterman. What broadcast channel hosts his show. ABC

H2.text: Tuesday marks the birthday of lat night tv host David Letterman. What broadcast channel hosts his show. FOX

H3.text: Tuesday marks the birthday of lat night tv host David Letterman. What broadcast channel hosts his show. CBS

A4.text: He hosted late-night television talk shows for 33 years, beginning with the February 1, 1982, debut of Late Night with David Letterman on NBC

A5.text: When NBC instead gave the job to Jay Leno, Letterman departed NBC to host his own late-night show on CBS

A6.text: CBS announced that his successor as the host of the program would be Stephen Colbert

A7.text: Late Show with David Letterman is an American late-night talk show hosted by David Letterman on CBS, the first iteration of the Late Show franchise
